## SendableLiquity.depositTHUSDInBammPool() method

Make a new Bamm Deposit, or top up existing one.

**Signature:**

```typescript
depositTHUSDInBammPool(amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentLiquityTransaction<S, LiquityReceipt<R, BammDepositChangeDetails>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of thUSD to add to new or existing deposit. |
